name: Music_4079.wav
keywords: ['slider didgeridoo', 'sound of water', 'hissing sound', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'quirky sounds', 'foley studio']
caption: This song features a slider didgeridoo being played. It starts off with the didgeridoo playing a note and then siding to a higher pitch. The sound of a water splash is played just before the slide. Then a hissing sound is heard followed by the didgeridoo being played once again without the vibration of the lips. This produces a hollow sound. This sound is produced in a foley studio.
